snippet.title: Game & Watch - Judge (Japan / green case) (c)1980 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description: This the 'green case' version of the game, released in Japan.  It has a scoring bug in 2 player mode (see my comment below for timestamps). Support for this will be in MAME 0.214, thanks to algestam for the emulation and hydef for the artwork.  Artwork can be found at https://drive.google.com/open?id=1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5
